overview: A disaster happened on the once happy planet: people stopped seeing the stars and became selfish and cruel. Only children do not give up hope of changing the world for the better. The boy Sasha and his brave friends, the cat Murmot and the doll Elya, embark on a magical journey to the Seventh Heaven to save the fairies and bring them a magic candlestick. Fairies can create a miracle, but only those who are kind, brave and have not forgotten how to dream can reach them, because on the way to them dreamers are waiting for dangerous enemies-temptations: Idleness, Laziness, Arrogance, Greed, Arrogance and Cowardice…
title: Stars of the Seventh Heaven
